title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Flip 4 reportedly stick with fingerprint sensor in power key
content:
We’re still a few months out from the debut of Samsung’s next generation of foldables, but information is slowly coming out regarding the new devices. Today, a new report claims that the Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Flip 4 will both ship with the same side-mounted fingerprint sensor as past generations.

more…

The post Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Flip 4 reportedly stick with fingerprint sensor in power key appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, Samsung is expected to keep the same side-mounted fingerprint sensor in the power button of the Galaxy Z Fold 4.
